system.note: Very Rare Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement, may not be acquirable elsewhere. Creatures hit by this must make +0 Strength Test and +0 Willpower Test, failing either or both causes creature gain 1 fatigue and be stunned for 1 round per combined DoF.
